FuncDef: The display service-ha global-information delay-time command displays global configurations of the value-added service management (VSM) high availability (HA) module.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the delayed backup time of the VSM HA module.
The delayed backup time of the VSM HA module can be configured using the service-ha delay-time command.
-

ExtraInfo: To view global configurations of the VSM HA module, such as the delayed backup time, run the display service-ha global-information command.
